gameDetails.name: Cacao: Chocolatl â€“ New Huts
gameDetails.description:
Contained in Brettspiel Adventskalender 2016 for Day 20.

Adds 3 new huts.

May only be played with Cacao & Cacao Chocolatl.

Rules:

    Place as a supply near the bank together with the other huts as described in the rule book.
    Depending on the huts in play, you have to play with the Map and/or Chocolate module.
